name: Keith Baker
bio:
Keith BakerÂ is a game designer and author best known for creating the Eberron Campaign Setting for Dungeons & Dragons. He has worked as a freelancer for Atlas Games, Green Ronin, Pelgrane Publishing, Wizards of the Coast, Goodman Games and more. Currently he is developing the card-based RPG Phoenix: Dawn Command through his company Twogether Studios.

He lives in Portland, Oregon with his wife Jennifer Ellis.
